Class Math

  • java.lang.Object
    • Math
  • public class Math
extends Object
    Generic class to perform mathematical operations.
    Version:
    2022/9/16

    • Method Detail

      • computeArea

        public double computeArea​(double base,
                          double height)
        Computes the area of a triangle from a given base and given height. Measurements are given in metric systems.
        Parameters:
        base - It's the base of the triangle. This value must be 0 or higher
        height - It's the height of the triangle. This value must be 0 or higher
        Returns:
        The area of the triangle in squared units.

      • isPalindrome

        public boolean isPalindrome​(String text)
        Checks if the text is a Palindrome (it's the same reading the text from left to right and reading it from right to left) Blanks are not consider. If the text is nulll, an error message will appear.
        Parameters:
        text - It's the text that is going to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the test is a Palindrome

      • getPrimesUnder

        public ArrayList<Integer> getPrimesUnder​(int limit)
        Returns a list containing the prime numbers lower than the given limit (included). If the limit is negative, an error message will appear
        Parameters:
        limit - It's the upper limit for calculating the primes
        Returns:
        A list containing the prime numbers lower than given limit

      • toString

        public String toString​(ArrayList<Integer> list)
        Returns a string from a given list. If the list is null an error message will appear
        Parameters:
        list - It's the given list to convert to a String
        Returns:
        A string from a given list

      • sortIntArray

        public int[] sortIntArray​(int[] array)
        Returns a list containing the numbers of the given limit sorted in ascending order. If the list is null, an error message will appear
        Parameters:
        array - It's the given list containing the numbers
        Returns:
        A list containing the of the given limit sorted in ascending order

      • randomMatrix

        public int[][] randomMatrix​(int row,
                            int col)
        Returns a matrix filled with non repeated random values for the given dimensions
        Parameters:
        row - It's the amount of rows that will have the matrix
        col - It's the amount of columns that will have the matrix
        Returns:
        The matrix filled with non repeates random values

      • verifyUniqueElements

        public boolean verifyUniqueElements​(int[] input)
        Checks if a given list is filled with non repeated values
        Parameters:
        input - It's the given list that it's going to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the list has unique elements

      • sumMatrix

        public int[][] sumMatrix​(int[][] a,
                         int[][] b)
        Returs the sum of 2 given matrices. If the dimension of the matrices is different, an error message will appear
        Parameters:
        a - It's one of the given matrices
        b - It's other given matrix
        Returns:
        The sum of the 2 matrices
